sentences.en: Bet you want a white picket fence, right?
sentences.cn: 打赌你想装白色的尖桩栅栏, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fire crews refused to cross the picket line.
sentences.cn: 消防人员拒不冲破围厂队伍人墙。

sentences.en: Here has the cunning Frenchman been plsting a picket directly in our path.
sentences.cn: 这个狡猾的法国佬,连在这儿咱们要通过的路上,也放着岗哨哩.

sentences.en: No one tried to cross the picket lines.
Picket signs for my wicked rhymes.
The miners are trying to get factory workers to join them on the picket line.
sentences.cn: 矿工正设法让工厂工人加入他们的纠察队人墙。

sentences.en: The newsreel people were there, taking pictures of the picket.
sentences.cn: 新闻摄影记者也在那儿, 给纠察队拍照.

sentences.en: The rat crossed the picket line and went back to work.
sentences.cn: 工贼越过警戒线回去工作.

sentences.en: There was a mass picket (= one involving a lot of people ) by students outside the main office of the university.
sentences.cn: 那所大学的主办公楼外有一支庞大的学生纠察队。

sentences.en: They lived in a typical suburban neighborhood with picket fences that resembled Nancy Kerrigan's teeth.
sentences.cn: 他们住在典型的城市近郊,有着像NancyKerrigan的牙一般的栅栏墙.

sentences.en: They marched to the factory and formed a picket.
sentences.cn: 他们向工厂前进,并组成了纠察队.

sentences.en: This knot is used for securing a rope to a spar, picket or anchorage.
sentences.cn: 图片右上方文字为:绳身左下文文字为:绳头本结用来把绳索固定在圆材 、 支柱或锚身上.

trans.tran_cn: 罢工纠察员，警戒队，[建]尖木桩，[军]步哨，哨兵
trans.tran_en: when a group of people stand or march in front of a shop, factory, government building etc to protest about something or to stop people from going in during a  strike

trans.tran_cn: 派……担任纠察；用尖桩围住
用尖桩围住，派…担任纠察，用警戒哨保卫，（把马等）系在桩上
